item.title: 16 Apr 2025 21:30
item.description:
Home for the next two years! We just got here last night. Arrivals at the airport was super chaos. We do know what not to do next time though!

The city per se feels like a tier two city in India. Looks like we came in just in time for the short-rainy season. Walk to work is literally two minutes! ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded:
Home for the next two years! We just got here last night. Arrivals at the airport was super chaos. We do know what not to do next time though!

The city per se feels like a tier two city in India. Looks like we came in just in time for the short-rainy season. Walk to work is literally two minutes! ðŸ”—
